basics.name: Sina Salehi
basics.summary: I have been building applications using various languages and technologies for almost 5 years. I am currently working as a senior software developer at PeakeSoftware. In my spare time, I have been working with graph databases, machine learning algorithms on big data sources and reading about new technologies. I am looking for a position in an agile environment within a small team of developers.

work.summary: Worked on an application designed to replace paper forms, gather investment information, and determine if the potential investment is suitable. The product is used by fortune 500 investment companies.
highlights: Designed and developed a compliance rule engine.
Used technologies/tools such as Spring Framework, JBoss, Backbone.js, Handlebars.js, Junit

work.summary: contributed to building and maintaiing an enterprise social networking platform and CMS.
highlights: Developed and maintained an internal self-hosted or SAAS-based social networking platform for 13.5k concurrent users.
Implemented features such as ,user groups, file management, pre-post validations based on rule checking.

Developed a platform to facilitate software development by outlining the software development lifecycle (S.D.L.C.), offer community question and answer forums, onboard associates, and schedule software product development.
Built Puppet scripts to provision development machines.
Used graph database to built activity stream and notification system.
Developed and used an MVC framework.
Contributed to development of a graph database ORM.

work.summary: Worked on Asmandez, which is a browser-based sci-fi strategy MMOG in the space opera genre. The game uses the latest web technologies, including HTML5 canvas inside the game and to show the in game cut-scenes.
highlights: Worked as a programmer, game developer and researcher
Worked with ZeroMQ to build the massage queue systems between the business- logic layers.
Researched on effective use of SVD (Singular Value Decomposition) in data feature reduction and feature selection
Researched on Clustering The Normalized Compression Distance For Malwares Instances

work.company: Iran University of Science and Technology
work.summary: Teaching Assistant for courses "Computer Architecture" and "Web Programming"
highlights: Tutored students in web-development skills and technologies including PHP, Microsoft ASP.NET, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.

education.institution: Iran University of Science and Technology
